conversation.content:
- 'Description': Informs users about the process and benefits of getting
    vaccinated.
  'Id': 96f685ca504b45678909e4f6a0
  'Capability Name': Vaccination Information
  'Entity':
  - 'Description': The specific virus for which vaccination information is
      being sought.
    'Identifier': b69883f4625c4296bf0e800fb3
    'Name': virus_name
  - 'Description': The name of the vaccine for the specified virus.
    'Identifier': edd16aca788c4e97a210637738
    'Name': vaccine_name
  - 'Description': The type of vaccine, such as mRNA, viral vector, or inactivated
      virus.
    'Identifier': 79ce789110e540f4a21a3df85c
    'Name': vaccine_type
  - 'Description': The current status of the vaccine, such as approved, emergency
      use authorization, or in clinical trials.
    'Identifier': 03f45ca1999343e696cd531c04
    'Name': vaccine_status
  - 'Description': Potential side effects of the vaccine.
    'Identifier': 1aa82a0a355e43b9b8a9de203d
    'Name': side_effects
    'Possible values':
    - Fatigue
    - Headache
    - Muscle Pain
    - Chills
    - Fever
  - 'Description': The efficacy of the vaccine in preventing the virus.
    'Identifier': a7d1beea590541528818a0211e
    'Name': efficacy
  - 'Description': The number and frequency of doses required for the vaccine.
    'Identifier': 57e779dda94d447d91a98813c0
    'Name': dosage
- 'Description': Helps users identify the symptoms associated with the virus.
  'Id': c35f5ba27be642bb8b19f80f23
  'Capability Name': Symptoms Detection
  'Entity':
  - 'Description': The specific virus or disease for which symptoms are being
      detected.
    'Identifier': dd3c26772e7a4c4f8cc32a189c
    'Name': virus_name
    'Possible values':
    - COVID-19
    - Influenza
    - Common Cold
    - SARS
    - MERS
  - 'Description': A symptom that might be associated with the virus or disease.
    'Identifier': 31ec44cc381f456690043a1ae4
    'Name': symptom
- 'Description': Discusses the process and logistics of distributing the
    vaccine.
  'Id': 8c4631db090f4d43bba1cd8d86
  'Capability Name': Vaccine Distribution
  'Entity':
  - 'Description': The type of vaccine being distributed.
    'Identifier': bcc2bef79beb4cc5b20fbb5fc1
    'Name': vaccine_type
  - 'Description': The location where the vaccine is being distributed.
    'Identifier': 2a9bb19b97fa46498942c26f1c
    'Name': location
  - 'Description': The population group receiving the vaccine.
    'Identifier': c39af8efd28c4969abd0215166
    'Name': population_group
- 'Description': Explains the origin and transmission methods of the virus.
  'Id': 3a43c14e6e7c4893903203b63c
  'Capability Name': Virus Causes
  'Entity':
  - 'Description': The specific virus being discussed.
    'Identifier': 91b6106f20b542a8bbf0d5ec5e
    'Name': virus_name
  - 'Description': The symptoms caused by the virus.
    'Identifier': 8adcd994fc954277aecb41170c
    'Name': symptoms
    'Possible values':
    - fever
    - cough
    - shortness of breath
    - fatigue
    - muscle or body aches
    - headache
    - new loss of taste or smell
    - sore throat
    - congestion or runny nose
    - nausea or vomiting
    - diarrhea
  - 'Description': The ways the virus can be transmitted from person to person.
    'Identifier': 5eba20780ed44a3abaf19c7683
    'Name': transmission_methods
- 'Description': Provides detailed information about the vaccine, its composition,
    and efficacy.
  'Id': 137764230d474c6da6ee8adf71
  'Capability Name': Vaccine Information
  'Entity':
  - 'Description': The specific vaccine name for the virus.
    'Identifier': 2d82924fa15042a59eaa892db6
    'Name': vaccine_name
    'Possible values':
    - Pfizer-BioNTech
    - Moderna
    - Johnson & Johnson's Janssen
    - AstraZeneca
  - 'Description': The type of vaccine for the virus.
    'Identifier': ff871e79538c4dd5be73e16221
    'Name': vaccine_type
  - 'Description': The status of the vaccine for the virus.
    'Identifier': b2cf1ddad2f348d6be43f32769
    'Name': vaccine_status
  - 'Description': The specific name of the virus.
    'Identifier': 6a3437099fb5484eb4cbb5e93f
    'Name': virus_name
- 'Description': Details the various treatment options available for the
    virus.
  'Id': 432d0cd04d83462d87fd6da899
  'Capability Name': Treatment Options
  'Entity':
  - 'Description': The specific virus that needs treatment.
    'Identifier': 043d0ffe6fc54b3e9087c7de45
    'Name': virus_name
  - 'Description': The type of treatment for the virus.
    'Identifier': dbaef327259f480598b7842bdf
    'Name': treatment_type
  - 'Description': The specific medication prescribed for the virus.
    'Identifier': 4d9c1e512b5641e286120c5339
    'Name': prescribed_medication

>> Above is a schema of different capabilities presented in YAML. Your task will be to classify the given user input which capability or multiple capabilities it matches. 
>
>> Please consider that you only can retrieve capability Ids as a reference. You also should extract all relevant entities present in the user input that associated with the chosen capability. Every Entity in the schema consists of a randomized alphanumeric ID and entity description. It may also contain "Possible-values", which mean that extracted attributes can diverge from those mentioned in schema while maintaining similarity. If multiple entities are provided, fill all the entities.  If an entity value does not exist in the given user text, give " NULL" as the value.
>
>> Please return your answer in the following format:

- intent_id: <intent_id1> 
  slots: 
   - slot1_id: <slot_id1> 
     slot1_value: <slot1_value> 
   - slot2_id: <slot_id2> 
     slot2_value: <slot2_value> 

>> IF  no capability can be identified, please return : 

```yaml
intents:
- id: none
  entities: []
```

**The utterance:**
I need information about sick leave policy in our company

conversation.rejected:
Sure! Here is the information requested:
>> intent_id: none
  entities: []
